name: Rise of Man
description: Rise of Man is a pre historic strategy game with city building and survival elements. Can you guide your people through the ages and conquer all the challenges ahead of them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core processor 64bit Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core i5 processor (or greater) 64bit Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 10 compatible card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
